idea:
Health Atmos is India’s first Health Management Organization with a Pan India Presence. We minimize your dependency on clinics and hospital by delivering health services like pathology, radiology, tele-consultation, suggesting hospitals for admission, nutrition, wellness coach & health equipment right to your door steps.

To name few of our esteemed clients- VFS Global, One Vasco, Via.com, Cipla, Netflix, Edelweiss, McDonalds, Nest Technologies, Journey Label, TAJ Hotels

Health Atmos Benefits:

• We are lab aggregator therefore we don’t have geographical limitations. We cover maximum cities in India compared to any other lab service provider as we have tie-up with more than 50 labs pan India who also has multiple branches.

• Recently for our client Akbar travels MICE project we served 1700 clients, in 25 states.

• Our CRM is capable of scheduling test, payment gateway and report submission.

• VFS global is using our CRM and we serve their clients daily on our CRM.

• Our CRM software is capable of deep integration with travel portal and app. Our associates can provide Covid test service to their clients/patrons without them having to leave their platform.

• We bring along all integration and alliance options to travel companies.

• https://dashboard.healthatmos.com/b2c/newonevasco same kind of link can be created for various employers through which employees can book their tests for RTPCR. Once booking is created our back end team gets in touch with further details. Through the same link payment can also be done.

• We can also arrange Pre-employment health checks, Periodic Health Check for employees, Factory Health checks and clinic management

• We also provide Online doctor’s consultation starting at Rs.300 for GP’s.

• We can provide any lab test & radiology service pan India.

• We can provide Ayurveda consultation, wellness coaching, nutritionist service, physiotherapist consultation and other allied medical service as well.
name: TREATMENT POSSIBLE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Skill Meet Academy is an edutech company run by Eies Institute of Education and Skilling Pvt Ltd which brings you the online mobile app base platform where you can pick up a program of your dream from the best Industry Mentors and faculties.Skill meet provides an opportunity to earn professional certification at an affordable cost so you don’t have to compromise on your dream, also helps deserving students by offering earn while you learn opportunity with paid on the job training during the course.Our network of Learning Centers provides best in class infrastructure to support a student with his lab work, practical’s & also helps students with career guidance and counselling. Industrial visits and study tours are organized for students that help them develop required competency mandatory for future career prospects.
name: EIES INSTITUTE OF EDUCATION AND SKILLINGPRIVATE LIMITED
